headline: 5 Must-Read Analyst Questions From Lennox’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Lennox’s first quarter results were marked by ongoing transitions in its product lineup and significant external cost pressures. While revenue and non-GAAP earnings per share both exceeded Wall Street expectations, the market responded negatively, reflecting concerns over margin compression and supply chain challenges. Management attributed the 140 basis point decline in operating margin primarily to higher input costs from new tariffs and inefficiencies tied to the regulatory shift to low-globa
